import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { AuthContext } from '../../context/AuthContext.jsx'; import './GuestDashboard.css'; const GuestDashboard = () => { const { user, logout } = useContext(AuthContext); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [myReservations, setMyReservations] = useState([]); const [activeReservations, setActiveReservations] = useState(0); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchGuestStats(); }, []); const fetchGuestStats = async () => { try { const response = await axios.get('/api/reservations'); const reservations = response.data.reservations || []; setMyReservations(reservations); setActiveReservations(reservations.filter(r => ['confirmed', 'checked-in'].includes(r.status)).length); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching reservations:', error); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; if (loading) { return (

Preparing your luxury dashboard...

); } const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/login'); }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'confirmed': return 'status-confirmed'; case 'checked-in': return 'status-checked-in'; case 'checked-out': return 'status-checked-out'; case 'cancelled': return 'status-cancelled'; default: return 'status-pending'; } }; const upcomingReservation = myReservations.find(r => ['confirmed', 'checked-in'].includes(r.status)); return (
{/* Glass Hero + Navbar Strip */}
LuxuryStay Guest Lounge
Gold Member
{user?.firstName?.charAt(0)}{user?.lastName?.charAt(0)}
{user?.firstName} {user?.lastName} Guest
{/* Hero Section */}

Your private 5-star dashboard

Welcome back, {user?.firstName}

Seamlessly manage your stays, explore signature suites, and tailor every moment of your visit.

Total stays {myReservations.length}
Active {activeReservations}
Tier Gold
Upcoming stay {upcomingReservation ? upcomingReservation.status : 'No stay'}
{upcomingReservation ? ( <>

LuxuryStay Signature

{upcomingReservation.roomId?.roomType} Room {upcomingReservation.roomId?.roomNumber}

Check-in {new Date(upcomingReservation.checkInDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric' })}
Check-out {new Date(upcomingReservation.checkOutDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric' })}
) : (

No upcoming stay

Reserve a suite to unlock your personalized stay overview.

)}
{ e.preventDefault(); navigate('/rooms'); }}>
Instant booking Glass form
{/* Rooms & Suites Grid */}

Rooms & Signature Suites

{/* Services Strip */}

Curated guest services

{/* Stats Cards */}

My Reservations

{myReservations.length}

Total Bookings

Active Bookings

{activeReservations}

Currently Active

Loyalty Status

Gold

Premium Member
{/* Recent Reservations */}

Recent Reservations

{myReservations.length > 0 ? (
{myReservations.slice(0, 5).map((reservation) => (
Confirmation # {reservation.confirmationNumber}
{reservation.status}
Room {reservation.roomId?.roomNumber} - {reservation.roomId?.roomType}
Check-in {new Date(reservation.checkInDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })}
Check-out {new Date(reservation.checkOutDate).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' })}
Amount ${reservation.totalAmount?.toFixed(2)}
))}
) : (

No Reservations Yet

Start your luxury journey by booking your first stay

)}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default GuestDashboard;
